content: How about a "Game Night Gala" theme? We can decorate with a black, white, and gold color scheme and set up different gaming stations with various board games, including the Ticket to Ride game. We can also have a "game station" area where guests can play different games and win prizes. For food, we can serve snacks and drinks inspired by different board games, such as "Ticket to Ride" train-shaped sandwiches and "Settlers of Catan" resource-themed desserts. What do you think?
